doc:
Charles Bickford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Bickford 0 Charles Ambrose Bickford (January 1, 1891 – November 9, 1967) was an American actor best known for his supporting roles. He was nominated three times for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor, for The Song of Bernadette (1943), The Farmer's Daughter (1947), and Johnny Belinda (1948). Other notable roles include Whirlpool (1948), A Star is Born (1954), and The Big Country (1958). Charles_Ambrose_Bickford ( January_1_,_1891 – November_9_,_1967 ) was an_American_actor best_known for his_supporting_roles . He was_nominated three_times for the_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor , for The_Song of Bernadette_(_1943_) , The_Farmer 's_Daughter_(_1947_) , and Johnny_Belinda_(_1948_) . Other_notable_roles include Whirlpool_(_1948_) , A_Star is_Born (_1954_) , and The_Big_Country_(_1958_) .
